1110100111110101 1001110100101101 1 -> sum: 1000011100100011, cout: 1
0111110000100001 0010000000011100 1 -> sum: 1001110000111110, cout: 0
0101000000110110 0100001111001011 0 -> sum: 1001010000000001, cout: 0
0000011111100010 0100010111100110 0 -> sum: 0100110111001000, cout: 0
0110110101000101 0011110011000100 1 -> sum: 1010101000001010, cout: 0
0001111101001111 1011000100001011 1 -> sum: 1101000001011011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
